concept.title: General Macros
concept.shortdesc: Describes macros that can be used in the platform-specific configuration header and in bootstrap code.

section.title: INIT_LOGICAL_SYMBOL
section.p: Checks if the symbol SYM is defined. If so, it sets it to a value which is logically TRUE and increments symbol COUNT by one; COUNT may be omitted if not required.
If the symbol SYM is not defined, then the macro defines it, and sets it to a logically FALSE value.

section.title: INIT_NUMERIC_SYMBOL
section.p: Checks if the symbol SYM is defined. If so, its value is left unchanged.
If SYM is not defined, then the macro defines it as a numeric variable and sets its value to DEFAULT.

section.title: INIT_NUMERIC_CONSTANT
section.p: Checks if the symbol SYM is defined. If so, its value is left unchanged.
If SYM is not defined, then the macro defines it as a numeric constant and sets its value to DEFAULT.
